channel.title: Purpose on ProZine
channel.description: Recent content in Purpose on ProZine

item.title: Craftsmanship
item.description: I didn’t really give my craft the focus it deserved until I discovered my purpose. One’s purpose tends to evolve with time. purpose: Make It Easier For Others craft: Software Solution Development Once I’d started really applying myself to my craft I noticed that a lot of what I had been percieving situation problems fell away.
